summary: Generates and applies an equi‑spaced under‑sampling mask to MRI k‑space data, preserving a configurable proportion of central low‑frequency columns and selecting the remaining columns at regular intervals to achieve a desired acceleration factor. When multiple center‑fraction and acceleration pairs are supplied, one pair is randomly chosen each time the object is invoked.
business_intent: Facilitate accelerated MRI acquisition simulation and reconstruction by reducing k‑space data volume while retaining essential low‑frequency information for image quality.
